title: Dictionary Iteration
code:
§begin iterate_dict
  scores ← §create_map
  scores["Alice"] ← 95
  scores["Bob"] ← 87
  scores["Carol"] ← 92
  §iterate name §in scores
    §transmit name
  §end_iterate
§end
solution_description: creates a dictionary and iterates through its keys
hints: Iterating over a dictionary visits its keys
Three names are stored as keys
